alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 545 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hialeah, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Hialeah, Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Miami Gardens, Doral, Miami Lakes, Hialeah Gardens, Opa-Locka, Miami Springs, Medley, West Little River, Gladeview, Palm Springs North, Liberty City, Country Club, Pennsuco, Miami International Airport, Intersection Krome And U.S. 27 and Westview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
